## Level 2 Enhancement Generator (ZXedit only, Edit-TF only does Level 1)
Usage in brief:

Line 1 (under the header) is row position 41, and so on. Enhance lines in order.
Valid line numbers, in order: 41-63,40 (fastext is 40, because reasons).
Load the page you want in ZXedit and make sure it's rendering in Level 2.
Per row:
Add enhancement, enter row pos, choose 'Set Position' and enter column pos.
Add enhancement, enter col pos, choose 'Set Foreground', choose CLUT and colour.
Add enhancement, enter same col pos, choose 'Block Mosaic' and enter its hex.
Add more enhancements for the current col or the next col on the current row.
After all enhancements are set:
Copy the extended hashstring snippet, which begins with 'X26='
Add a colon to the hashstring in the page editor
Paste the extended hashstring snippet after the colon and load the new URL
Enjoy your enhancements

https://zxnet.co.uk/teletext/enhancement/enhancements.html
